description: Pears and bourbon are the perfect matches. They say that there is no such thing as too much of a good thing, and this recipe proves it!
keywords: Pear And Bourbon Smash Cocktail Recipe
How To Pear And Bourbon Smash
name: Pear And Bourbon Smash
recipeIngredient: 1 pc. Pear, cut into cubes or ½ oz. Pear vodka

recipeInstructions.name: In a blender, combine the ingredients (except the bourbon) and blend it until it reaches the consistency of a smoothie.
recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, combine the ingredients (except the bourbon) and blend it until it reaches the consistency of a smoothie.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the bourbon and stir the mixture. Divide evenly into 2 glasses over ice.
